        List<Sale> getSalesForCategory(String categoryName,
                               Date from,

                        throws EntityDoesNotExistException
        Get all sales for given category from given period of time
        Parameters:
        categoryName - name of category
        from - minimum date for sales
        to - maximum date for sales
        Returns:
        list of sales
        Throws:
        EntityDoesNotExistException - if there is no such category
